## Content Guidelines Checklist
<!-- For research/content features -->

- [ ] Feature maintains clear distinction between historical facts and theoretical concepts
- [ ] Feature includes appropriate disclaimers for AI-generated content
- [ ] Feature provides verifiable source links where applicable
- [ ] Feature does not claim operational/proven status for theoretical systems

---

*NOTE: The Chicago Plasma Forest Network is an AI-generated theoretical framework. New features should align with the project's mission of documenting real historical research while creating speculative visions of decentralized energy.*
